body.name: OXO Tot Travel Size Drying Rack with Bottle Brush- Gray
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 12 hrs 1 min
features: All-in-one portable solution for cleaning and drying bottles, pump parts and more
Compact size tucks easily into any bag
Raised ridges keep items away from water at bottom of tray
Rack includes built-in bottle brush stand
Detail cleaner inside Brush features durable bristles for cleaning tight spaces such as bottle nipples, sippy cup, breast pump parts and more
Pegs keep bottles, cups and small parts elevated for quick drying
Bottle Brush fits securely onto pegs inside Drying Rack when not in use
Dimensions (open): 8.5 in x 10.75 in x 2 in/21.5 cm x 27.5 cm x 5 cm
Dimensions (closed): 8.5 in x 5.5 in x 2.25 in/21.5 cm x 14 cm x 5.5 cm
body.description: Make cleaning up away from home hassle-free with the OXO Tot On-the-Go Drying Rack with Bottle Brush. This compact cleaning kit is small enough to easily fit into diaper bags or purses while on the road. It opens into a drying rack with flexible tines that accommodate bottles, nipples, breast pump parts and more. Neatly tucked inside the folded drying rack are a silicone detail cleaner and bottle brush head that assemble to form a full-sized bottle brush. The brush has soft and firm bristles for gentle cleaning or serious scrubbing, plus a soft, non-slip handle. The silicone detail cleaner scrubs tight spots like bottle nipples and breast pump parts more effectively than bristles can. Ventilation holes provide aeration for quick drying, so you can say good-bye to wet brushes in inconvenient plastic bags. Dimensions: Open: 8.5 x 10.8 x 2.2 inches

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for travel
reviews.reviewText: I have used this travel kit several times since I purchased it. It’s so useful and the brush that comes in the kit is great. The bristles are kind of soft making it easy to clean baby’s bottles and pump parts. I usually can set two pumps and a bottle on the rack for truing. It’s compact and fits easily in the side of my baby’s diaper bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked really well for travel
reviews.reviewText: Used for the first time traveling alone with my baby and it was awesome. Set it up in the hotel room and was able to use at the airport as well. It comes apart easily and has a spot to stand up for it to dry as well. It was convenient, easy to use, and a space saver for me and my baby.

reviews.reviewerName: A M A Z O N addict
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY IT! Absolutely love it!
reviews.reviewText: Perfect travel kit! Compact, sturdy, easy to use and quick to clean (dishwasher) after your trip. Small pieces fit great on the drying rack! Tall bottles can be tippy in the rack, but not a big deal once you figure out what spot + tilt works for your bottles. If you travel do yourself a favor and buy this. Great for adult tumblers too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Travel!
reviews.reviewText: We were worried about how we were going to clean bottles in a hotel room and this was a lifesaver! It doesn't take up much room and works great for setting out bottle parts. The brush is awesome and works wonderfully. We will definitely be using this again soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for travel!
reviews.reviewText: Compact and perfect for travel! Very durable and easy to keep clean. Doesn’t have surfaces to grow mold. It works great and holds lots of bottles and pump parts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for traveling!
reviews.reviewText: Compact, easy to clean and durabel!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A little short, but ok
reviews.reviewText: Great and compact, virtually took up no room in my suitcase. However I use the 8 oz Dr. Brown's Bottles and they don't hold them up very well. They fell over when I would try to dry them upside down, the spikes were a little too short for them, but it wasn't a deal breaker since it is a travel drying rack, and if they were longer, it wouldn't be so compact. Brush was soft and efficient at cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great travel drying rack. Nice and compact. Comes with a brush which is perfect.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great compact drying rack and brush for travelling
reviews.reviewText: This was a real life saver for our family trips. It all folds up into a nice little box, the brush unscrews at the middle and sits nicely in amongst the drying spikes. It's super easy to clean, super easy to use. It's a smooth plastic casing so it doesn't suction to any surfaces and the brush handle does not have a suction cup, rather there is a recessed area in the box that holds the brush upright for drying. The fact that this brush is a two in one is also great! The main brush head at the top, and there is a smaller nipple brush on the handle which is hidden when you screw the handle onto the top part of the brush. The box itself is maybe 3 inches by 5 inches when it's closed, so it is super compact. We took 4 bottles with us on our latest trip and found that this held at least 3 bottles, fully dismantled, really well. Definitely worth it for travelling!

Used this when travelling with my infant. Travelled a ton his first year and brought this everywhere! Was great for cleaning breast pump and bottles. Stored well in this diaper bag
This is so compact, I love it. I like that the brush fits inside the case. It makes it easy to take travelling with a baby.
